long_description: The all-natural, moisturizing Badger SPF 15 lip balm stick protects lips from UVA and UVB rays. Natural, broad-spectrum formula provides protection from the sun's UVA and UVB rays without the use of harsh chemicals found in other sunscreens. Micronized zinc oxide forms a physical barrier against UVA and UVB rays; micronized zinc oxide leaves a slight white residue. Certified to contain at least 70% organic ingredients; chemical free and no added fragrance. Badger SPF 15 lip balm is great for kids and adults.
short_description: The all-natural, moisturizing Badger SPF 15 lip balm stick protects lips from UVA and UVB rays.
